title: Migrate All Skills to BASH_SOURCE Path Standard
description: Systematically update all golem-powers skills to use the BASH_SOURCE self-detection pattern established in AUDIT-001. This ensures all skills work from any current working directory.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Update coderabbit skill scripts to use BASH_SOURCE pattern
Update context7 skill scripts to use BASH_SOURCE pattern
Update test-plan skill scripts to use BASH_SOURCE pattern
Update create-pr skill scripts to use BASH_SOURCE pattern
Update convex skill scripts to use BASH_SOURCE pattern
Update linear skill scripts to use BASH_SOURCE pattern
Update archive skill scripts to use BASH_SOURCE pattern
Update all SKILL.md files to show correct usage examples
Test each updated skill from different working directories
Update skill template generator to include BASH_SOURCE pattern
Run shellcheck on all updated scripts
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)
Commit: feat: MP-130 migrate skills to BASH_SOURCE standard

notes: This MP story implements the path standard designed in AUDIT-001. Priority order: coderabbit, context7, test-plan, create-pr (high usage), then convex, linear, archive (medium usage). Each skill needs: 1) BASH_SOURCE self-detection, 2) project root detection if needed, 3) updated documentation examples.
